q: "Hopefully, I'll be with the Eagles next year. We'll see what happens," said Michael Vick , who added that he expects "everything to go according to plan." We'll see what happens over the next couple months. I just[ have] to be patient and take it day by day, he said. That's with anybody, though. If a guy's going well, you milk it. You just keep running the same play over and over until they stop it. Allen Iverson followed up his 54-point game in Milwaukee with 51 this time, becoming the first Sixers player to score 50 in back-to-back games and the first Philadelphia player to accomplish the feat since Wilt Chamberlain for the Warriors in 1962

NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
